Nov 19 (Reuters) -

  • GOOGLE HAS OFFICIALLY BEEN INVITED TO BID ON DOD'S JOINT WARFIGHTING CLOUD CAPABILITY, ALONGSIDE AMAZON, MICROSOFT AND ORACLE - NYT REPORTER
